verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Verse: 1
When the mountains fall and the tempest roars
You are with me
When creation falls still my soul will soar
On Your mercy

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Pre Chorus:
I'll walk through the fire with my head lifted high
And my spirit revived in Your story
I'll look to the cross as my failure is lost
In the light of Your glorious grace

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Let the ruins come to life in the beauty of Your name
Rising up from the ashes God forever You reign
And my soul will find refuge in the shadow of Your wings
I will love You forever and forever I'll sing

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Verse 2:
When the world caves in still my hope will cling
To Your promise
When my courage ends let my heart find strength
In Your presence
